    CreateNewTexture(in Identifier, in int, in int, ref Renderer, in uint)

    Create a new blank texture, store it in TextureCache and return it.

    Declaration
    public Texture CreateNewTexture(in Identifier identifier, in int width, in int height, ref Renderer renderer, in uint pixelType = 373694468)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Identifier identifier

    The unique identifier for cache
    int width

    Texture width in pixels
    int height

    Texture height in pixels
    Renderer renderer

    Reference to the Game's Renderer Instance.
    uint pixelType

    Should be either RGB_PIXELTYPE or RGBA_PIXELTYPE
    Returns
    Type Description
    Texture

    Blank Texture, ready to be drawn on
    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    ArgumentException

    Identifier is already bound to a texture.

    GetTexture(in Identifier, ref Renderer)

    Retrieves a texture from cache. When not found, it tries to load the texture from storage.

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Identifier identifier

    Texture identifier
    Renderer renderer

    Reference to the Game's Renderer Instance.
    Returns
    Type Description
    Texture

    The texture if found.

    ReadAllLines(in Identifier, Encoding?, ReadLinesFlags)

    Read all text lines of a text file

    Declaration
    public static string[] ReadAllLines(in Identifier identifier, Encoding? encoding = null, ResourceManager.ReadLinesFlags flags = ReadLinesFlags.None)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Identifier identifier

    The identifier of that text file
    Encoding encoding

    The Encoding used for reading this text file. The default is null which uses UTF8 as fallback.
    ResourceManager.ReadLinesFlags flags

    See ResourceManager.ReadLinesFlags
    Returns
    Type Description
    string[]

    A string array with all lines of text from that file.
    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    ArgumentException

    File does not exist.

    Returns

    A string with all text loaded from that file.
